getPixelColor(int, int) - Method in interface lab3.Image
Retrieves the color of the pixel at the specified coordinates (x, y).
getPixelColor(int, int) - Method in class lab3.RealImage
Retrieves the color of the pixel at the specified coordinates (x, y).
getPixelColor(int, int) - Method in class lab3.RestrictedImageDecorator
Retrieves the color of the pixel at the specified coordinates if they are within the allowed bounds.

I

Image - Interface in lab3
Interface representing an image with methods to manipulate pixel colors.

R

RealImage - Class in lab3
Class representing a real image, containing pixel data and allowing manipulation of pixel colors.

Constructs a RealImage with the specified width and height.
RestrictedImageDecorator - Class in lab3
Decorator class that restricts access to an image by limiting which pixel coordinates are accessible.
RestrictedImageDecorator(Image, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class lab3.RestrictedImageDecorator
Constructs a RestrictedImageDecorator with a specified real image and bounds.
